page.title: 09RECREATION IN PETERLEE
page.content: We play games like football where you kick and pass the ball to your team. There are 11 team members and the aim is to score goals. If you get into the top Divisions you might go to play at wembly and win a cup. We also play cricket. One man has a bat and he has to hit the ball which the bowler throws at the wicket (stump) In some people's leisure time they like to read books, walk in the park, swim or ride their bikes. In our leisure time we do things we would not do normally For our entertainment we enjoy dancing, listening to the radio and playing records, watching television and sports games. We also play board games such monopoly, cluedo and scrabble, and games on paper like hangman and noughts and crosses.
